name: Otter Swim
description:
Otter Swim Otter Swim is a game where you must dodge all the trash in the ocean. Don't let the Otter hit the trash! Play on Mobile or on PC! (Some Mobile devices won't work with Unity WebGL) Help save our oceans! Donate to 4ocean to remove a pound of trash from the ocean!

https://www.4ocean.com/

Controls:

Mobile: Joystick (Up is down, Down is up)

Computer: W - Up, S - Down

Current Version:

v. 1.0
